typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CUST_ID as decimal(38,0),
		CUSTOMER_NAME as string,
		DEPT_ID as decimal(38,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'query',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM DBO.CUSTOMER',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> customer
source(output(
		DEPT_ID as decimal(38,0),
		DEPT_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'DEPARTMENT',
	schemaName: 'DBO',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> department
customer, department lookup(customer@DEPT_ID == department@DEPT_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LKdepartment
LKdepartment split(DEPT_NAME=='HR'
,
	DEPT_NAME=='Finance',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(HR, Finance, Other)
ConditionalSplit1@HR sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'HR',
	schemaName: 'DBO',
	deletable: false,
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	truncate: true,
	store: 'snowflake',
	mapColumn(
		CUST_ID,
		CUSTOMER_NAME,
		DEPT_ID = ConditionalSplit1@HR@DEPT_ID,
		DEPT_ID = ConditionalSplit1@HR@DEPT_ID,
		DEPT_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkHR
ConditionalSplit1@Finance sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'FINANCE',
	schemaName: 'DBO',
	deletable: false,
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	store: 'snowflake',
	mapColumn(
		CUST_ID,
		CUSTOMER_NAME,
		DEPT_ID = ConditionalSplit1@Finance@DEPT_ID,
		DEPT_ID = ConditionalSplit1@Finance@DEPT_ID,
		DEPT_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
